name: Korea
comment1: siteSpnObjId is the object id associated with the managed application for the site-specific service principal (msteams-webhook-xx-service-principal)
comment2: cosmosaccountname is name abbrevation for creating cosmos databse account
comment3: If isSingleRegion value is false, golocal has two regions and storage accounts will be RA-GRS, if value is true golocal has one region and storage accounts,cosmos are ZRS(Zone Redundant)
comment4: notificationstorage is abbrevation of azure region specific storage account, it can be asia(asea,asse), europe(euno,euwe) or america specific
comment5: priorityNotificationsdb is abbrevation of azure region specific cosmos db account, it can be APAC or  EU and priorityNotificationsgroup is resource group in which cosmos account resides
